       <div align="left">

         Pour renforcer santé et plaisir de vivre
        </span>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="wa-comp wa-text wa-bg-gradient param[grad(rgba(0,0,0,0)) border(0 #969696)] " style="position:absolute;z-index:10028;left:21px;top:74px;width:185px;height:25px;border:0px;background:rgba(0,0,0,0);overflow:hidden;">
      <div style="position:absolute;z-index:10;line-height:1.2;margin:2px;top:0px;left:0px;width:183px;height:23px;word-wrap:break-word;overflow-y:auto;overflow-x:hidden;">
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:10px;font-weight:bold;color:#ffffff;">
         HOMÉOPATHIE - P.N.L. - HYPNOSE
        </span>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="wa-comp wa-text wa-bg-gradient param[grad(270 32 590 32 #dfe2af rgba(223,226,175,0)) border(0 #969696)] " style="position:absolute;z-index:10024;left:0px;top:25px;width:1000px;height:47px;border:0px;background:-webkit-gradient(linear,270 32, 590 32,from(#dfe2af),to(rgba(223,226,175,0)));background:-moz-linear-gradient(top left 0deg,#dfe2af 270px,rgba(223,226,175,0) 590px);overflow:hidden;">
      <div style="position:absolute;z-index:10;line-height:1.2;margin:2px;top:0px;left:0px;width:998px;height:45px;word-wrap:break-word;overflow-y:auto;overflow-x:hidden;">
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:Times New Roman,TimesNewRoman;font-size:36px;font-weight:bold;color:#557067;">
        </span>
        <span style="font-family:'Georgia';font-size:36px;font-weight:normal;font-style:italic;color:#557067;">
         Céline Thomas
        </span>
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:15px;font-weight:bold;color:#557067;">
         inf.
        </span>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <img alt="" class="wa-img wa-comp " src="header1.jpg?v=1smqg84h1n2kx86" style="position:absolute;z-index:10020;left:0px;top:0px;width:1000px;height:200px;border:0px;-moz-border-radius:5px 5px 0px 0px;border-radius:5px 5px 0px 0px;-webkit-border-top-left-radius:5px;-webkit-border-top-right-radius:5px;-webkit-border-bottom-right-radius:0px;-webkit-border-bottom-left-radius:0px;-webkit-box-shadow:0px 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.8);-moz-box-shadow:0px 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.8);box-shadow:0px 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.8);"/>
     <div class="wa-comp wa-text wa-bg-gradient param[grad(rgba(0,0,0,0)) border(0 #969696)] " style="position:absolute;z-index:10016;left:352px;top:277px;width:300px;height:100px;border:0px;background:rgba(0,0,0,0);overflow:hidden;">
      <div style="position:absolute;z-index:10;line-height:1.2;margin:2px;top:0px;left:0px;width:298px;height:98px;word-wrap:break-word;overflow-y:auto;overflow-x:hidden;">
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Georgia';font-size:20px;font-weight:normal;font-style:italic;color:#cc2a14;">
         La personne est accueillie avec
        </span>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Georgia';font-size:20px;font-weight:normal;font-style:italic;color:#cc2a14;">
         une écoute de ses besoins
        </span>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Georgia';font-size:20px;font-weight:normal;font-style:italic;color:#cc2a14;">
         et dans le respect de ses valeurs
        </span>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <img alt="" class="wa-img wa-comp " src="celine_thomas2.jpg?v=3nwf28i3h6v1c8" style="position:absolute;z-index:10008;left:728px;top:288px;width:212px;height:290px;border:0px;"/>
     <div class="wa-comp wa-text wa-bg-gradient param[grad(rgba(0,0,0,0)) border(0 #969696)] " style="position:absolute;z-index:10004;left:21px;top:277px;width:300px;height:485px;border:0px;background:rgba(0,0,0,0);overflow:hidden;">
      <div style="position:absolute;z-index:10;line-height:1.2;margin:2px;top:0px;left:0px;width:298px;height:483px;word-wrap:break-word;overflow-y:auto;overflow-x:hidden;">
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         Ayant œuvré dans le milieu de la santé
        </span>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         comme infirmière durant de nombreuses années,
        </span>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         je suis convaincue, de par mes observations,
        </span>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         que le corps humain possède une
        </span>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         puissante capacité de guérison.
        </span>
       </div>
       <div style="font-family:''Arial'';font-size:13.33px;">
        <br/>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         Forte de cette conviction, je me suis questionnée
        </span>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         à savoir s'il existait différentes approches
        </span>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         holistiques qui peuvent aider à appuyer
        </span>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         cette capacité de guérison, avant que
        </span>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         la maladie ne s'installe définitivement.
        </span>
       </div>
       <div style="font-family:''Arial'';font-size:13.33px;">
        <br/>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         En d'autres termes, pouvons-nous aider à
        </span>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         prévenir la maladie (autant qu’il est possible) et
        </span>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         préserver un bien-être physique et psychique ?
        </span>
       </div>
       <div style="font-family:''Arial'';font-size:13.33px;">
        <br/>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         C'est ainsi que je me suis dirigée en thérapie brève
        </span>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         (P.N.L.), puis en homéopathie et en hypnose.
        </span>
       </div>
       <div style="font-family:''Arial'';font-size:13.33px;">
        <br/>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         Après 35 ans dans le milieu hospitalier, j'opte maintenant pour une pratique privée.
        </span>
       </div>
       <div style="font-family:''Arial'';font-size:13.33px;">
        <br/>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         Tous ces apprentissages me permettent
        </span>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         de réaliser cet objectif: permettre à l'individu
        </span>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         un retour à son autonomie dans un équilibre-santé
        </span>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         le plus complet possible, tant physique
        </span>
       </div>
       <div align="left">
        <span style="font-family:'Arial';font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;color:#6c7c96;">
         qu'émotionnel et psychique.
        </span>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <span class="wa-bg-gradient param[grad(80 55 90 555 #dfe2af #ffffff) border(0 #969696)] wa-comp " style="position:absolute;z-index:10000;left:0px;top:230px;width:1000px;height:555px;border:0px;-webkit-box-shadow:0px 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.8);-moz-box-shadow:0px 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.8);box-shadow:0px 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.8);background:-webkit-gradient(linear,80 55, 90 555,from(#dfe2af),to(#ffffff));background:-moz-linear-gradient(top left 271deg,#dfe2af 57px,#ffffff 557px);">
